text: Prince Tony Momoh (27 April 1939 â€“ 1 February 2021) was a Nigerian journalist and politician. He was Nigerian Minister of Information and Culture from 1986 to 1990 during the military regime of General Ibrahim Babangida. Momoh was born in Auchi, Nigeria. He died on 1 February 2021 in Lagos, Nigeria at the age of 81. ==References== Category:1939 births Category:2021 deaths Category:Nigerian politicians Category:Nigerian journalists Category:People from Edo State
title: Tony Momoh
